com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface AbstractTool

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AddsToRuleKey, Tool
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Archiver, Compiler, Javac, Kotlinc, Linker, Preprocessor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BsdArchiver, ClangCompiler, ClangPreprocessor, DarwinLinker, DefaultCompiler, DelegatingTool, ExternalJavac, ExternalKotlinc, GccCompiler, GccPreprocessor, GnuArchiver, GnuLinker, HashedFileTool, JarBackedJavac, JarBackedReflectedKotlinc, JdkProvidedInMemoryJavac, Jsr199Javac, VersionedTool, WindowsArchiver, WindowsCompiler, WindowsLinker, WindowsPreprocessor

    public interface AbstractTool
extends Tool
    Provides default implementations of Tool functions. This is only a separate class because Tool cannot depend on some of the things used here.

    • Method Summary
